pull.title: refactor: privatize SignatureExtractorChecker [moveonly]
pull.body:
~If we add a CTxIn constructor to SignatureData, then constructing the
SignatureData directly is no more verbose than calling DataFromTransaction,
and grants the caller additional flexibiliy in how to provide the CTxIn.~

A simple change to enhance encapsulation.

rename.from: refactoring: Inline DataFromTransaction via new SignatureData constructor
rename.to: refactoring: Convert DataFromTransaction to a SignatureData constructor, privatize and drop dead code from helpers

events.body: ~This has developed into a bit of a follow-up on #13425. @achow101 would you take a look?~

comments.body: I would prefer to keep `SignatureData` independent from the data being signed.
